name: deskHPSDR MinGW Cross-Compilation
postCreateCommand: echo '✓ MinGW devcontainer pronto!' && echo '' && echo 'Per compilare:' && echo '  mkdir -p build && cd build' && echo '  cmake -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=/opt/mingw-toolchain.cmake ..' && echo '  make -j4' && echo '' && echo 'Verifica ambiente:' && export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/x86_64-w64-mingw32/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/x86_64-w64-mingw32/lib64/pkgconfig && pkg-config --exists gtk+-3.0 && echo '  ✓ GTK3 OK' || echo '  ✗ GTK3 MANCANTE - ricostruire il container!'
